name: Meta FPS
description: What is the project about? MetaPlayersGG is the bridge between eSports and the crypto world. Join our ecosystem and be part of the future of eSports! What makes your project unique? Create or join eSport tournaments, complete challenges, play for crypto prizes, find the best teams and the hottest Play 2 Earn games on metaplayers.gg. What’s next for your project? An ecosystem with endless possibilities We’re building a mutually beneficial, tournament-centered network for eSport marketers, content creators, organizers and players alike. NFTs with purpose Buy gaming NFTs, passes, in-game items, and pieces of our own utility-focused NFT collection for $MFPS token in the MetaPlayers marketplace. What can your token be used for? Reach new audiences in an authentic, noninvasive way through eSports tournament, player, or live stream sponsorship.
